bibl.title: Chartae Latinae Antiquiores. Facsimile-Edition of the Latin Charters Prior to the Ninth Century. Part XLVII. Addenda. Published by Tiziano DORANDI and Pierre GASNAULT.
bibl.note: Ch.L.A. XLVII, 1403-1468. -Addenda to: Part III. British Museum, London. No. 1403; - Part IV. Great Britain (without British Museum London), Nos 1404-1436; - Part V. The United States of America I. Nos 1437-1445; - Part IX. The United States of America V. Nos 1446-1453; - Part XI. Germany II. Nos 1454-1459; - Part XXV. Italy VI. Nos 1460-1462; - Part XXVII. Italy VIII. Nos 1463-1464; - Part XLVI. Nos 1465-1468.
